text: The Luzhin Defence is a 2000 British French romantic drama movie directed by Marleen Gorris and starring John Turturro, Emily Watson, Geraldine James, Stuart Wilson, Christopher Thompson, Fabio Sartor. The screenplay was based on the 1930 novel The Defense by Vladimir Nabokov. == Other websites == * Category:2000 romantic drama movies Category:British romantic drama movies Category:French romance movies Category:French drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Marleen Gorris
title: The Luzhin Defence
